articles.description: England's men end 2023 with a 3-2 T20 series defeat by West Indies in Trinidad.
articles.title: England suffer T20 series defeat by West Indies

articles.description: Lucas Vázquez strikes deep in stoppage time as 10-man Real Madrid win at Alaves to go top of La Liga.
articles.title: Ten-man Real Madrid beat Alaves to go top

articles.description: Uefa president Aleksander Ceferin says "football is not for sale" after plans for a revamped European Super League were announced.
articles.title: Football is not for sale - Uefa president Ceferin

articles.description: Australia's Usman Khawaja wore a black armband in support of civilians in Gaza during the first Test against Pakistan.
articles.title: Khawaja charged for armband in support of Gaza

articles.description: Danny Welbeck's late looping header rescues a point for Brighton against rivals Crystal Palace at Selhurst Park in the Premier League.
articles.title: Late Welbeck header gives Brighton draw at Palace

articles.description: Anthony Joshua said "I'm here to fight, not party" at a cordial news conference for Saturday's heavyweight contest with Otto Wallin.
articles.title: Of course I'm tense, I want to win - Joshua

articles.description: Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola compares Club World Cup final opponents Fluminense's style of football with the great Brazilian teams of the 20th century.
articles.title: 'Like watching Brazil' - Guardiola on Fluminense test

articles.description: Teenager Luke Littler continues his dream PDC World Championship debut as he defeats UK Open champion Andrew Gilding to reach the third round.
articles.title: PDC World Championship 2024: Teenager Luke Littler continues his dream debut with win over Andrew Gilding

articles.description: England head coach Matthew Mott remains confident about England's T20 World Cup defence in 2024 despite the series defeat by West Indies.
articles.title: England have 'exciting things' ahead in T20s - Mott

articles.description: England and Sydney Sixers all-rounder Tom Curran receives a four-game ban in Australia's Big Bash League after being found guilty of intimidating an umpire.
articles.title: Tom Curran given BBL ban for intimidating umpire
